====== store ======
{#JAPI Joomla.Framework Cache JCache::store #}

Store the cached data by id and group

===== Syntax =====
boolean store	( **$data**, **$id**, **$group** )

| **$id** | string | The cache data id |
| **$group** | string | The cache data group |
| **$data** | mixed | The data to store |

===== Examples =====
<code php|Example>

</code>
